outputs.output_descr: The PPG will focus on activities that are necessary to collect adequate information and conduct relevant analysis to prepare the full-sized project and CEO Endorsement Request for the full-sized project to promote Non-fired Brick (NFB) production and utilization. The main outputs of the PPG are: i) Projetc Document; ii) CEO Endorsement Request (CER); iii) Letters of Commitment for Co-financing; iii)Negotiated Memorandum of Understanding with selected financial partner(s) on financial schemes designated to NFB application and manufacturing of NFB production line components/parts; iv) relevant completed GEF tracking tools including the logical framework; v) Completed responses matrix for comments from the GEF and GEF council members.

project_descr: Project Preparation Grant for the Promotion of Non-fired Brick Production and Utilization in Viet Nam
project_title: Promotion of Non-fired Brick Production and Utilization
